column5: Went down to my usual haunt tonight with the girlfriend and some hopes of tying into more eyes or maybe a pike.  Fished a couple hours with only a follow until a slender toothed esox grabbed the line, after a nice fight she was in my greedy little hands.        All in all it was a great night out, had lots of fun and thats the idea right?  The picture series is about 40 pics from the hookset right up to the release, Lisa has never seen a pike before and got a little trigger happy with the camera!  tightlines all
kemper,..she'll only get better Bud! At least you got the before/during and hold pic down and the memory of the moment that will last. bNb
Nice job kemper! A picture is worth a thousand words.
Nice Pike and the shore fishin seems fine
Great pic, what a thick pike for it's length.
Nice fish kemper, that's some nice shots taken by your girl there!

Great stuff Kemper!  Tell us the truth...you bring your g/f with you so she can take pics right?  You set up her rod without hooks cause you don't want her outfishing you....hehe. (like Bly does to me)  Way to go...that's a nice pike!
Well done!  Don't listen to Clifford..  Bly can outfish him with paper clips and snot.  Gitty on up!  HD
Black and white pics are great!  I wish I could get my gf out fishing with me
